publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3737 Karen Whitefield: Congratulations to Calderhead High School—That the Parliament congratulates Calderhead High School in Shotts on its outstanding production, Grease is the Word; notes that this is the first such production by the school in many years; recognises the hard work and commitment invested by pupils, staff and all others involved in making the production such a success; commends Calderhead High School for setting such a high standard in this year’s show and hopes that it will become a regular event; recognises the huge benefits of engaging young people in drama, and wishes Calderhead High School and its pupils every success in their future productions.

S3M-3737 Congratulations to Calderhead High School (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Ken Macintosh*, Angela Constance*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Helen Eadie*, Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3737 Karen Whitefield: Congratulations to Calderhead High School—That the Parliament congratulates Calderhead High School in Shotts on its outstanding production, Grease is the Word; notes that this is the first such production by the school in many years; recognises the hard work and commitment invested by pupils, staff and all others involved in making the production such a success; commends Calderhead High School for setting such a high standard in this year’s show and hopes that it will become a regular event; recognises the huge benefits of engaging young people in drama, and wishes Calderhead High School and its pupils every success in their future productions. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Ken Macintosh, Angela Constance, Mr Frank McAveety, Hugh O’Donnell, Pauline McNeill, Trish Godman, Christina McKelvie, Stuart McMillan, Helen Eadie, Des McNulty, Jackie Baillie, Sandra White, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3737 Congratulations to Calderhead High School (lodged on 18 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3737 Congratulations to Calderhead High School (lodged on 18 March 2009) David Stewart*
